Script.Name: Show ads and suggestions
Afficher les publicités et les sugestions
Script.Description: This script disables ads and app suggestions. This setting affects the current user.
Ce script désactive les publicités et les suggestions d'applications. Ce paramètre affecte l'utilisateur actuel.

Code.Detect:
$currentValues = Get-ItemPropertyValue -Path "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\ContentDeliveryManager" -Name( "FeatureManagementEnabled", "OemPreInstalledAppsEnabled", "PreInstalledAppsEnabled", "PreInstalledAppsEverEnabled", "RotatingLockScreenEnabled", "RotatingLockScreenOverlayEnabled", "SilentInstalledAppsEnabled", "SoftLandingEnabled", "SubscribedContent-310093Enabled", "SubscribedContent-338387Enabled", "SubscribedContent-338388Enabled", "SubscribedContent-338389Enabled", "SubscribedContent-338393Enabled", "SubscribedContent-353694Enabled", "SubscribedContent-353696Enabled", "SystemPaneSuggestionsEnabled")
$currentValues += Get-ItemPropertyValue -Path "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Explorer\Advanced" -Name ( "ShowSyncProviderNotifications")
$currentValues += Get-ItemPropertyValue -Path "HKCU:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\AdvertisingInfo" -Name ( "Enabled")
if (($currentValues -eq 1).Count -eq $currentValues.Count) { exit 1 } elseif (($currentValues -eq 0).Count -eq $currentValues.Count) { exit 0 } else { exit -1 }
